name: Loading Human
summary:
Loading Human is a Sci-Fi adventure game born for Virtual Reality. 
 
Set in a distant future, the game will give you the life of Prometheus, a pilot that will travel across the galaxy to retrieve the quintessence, the most powerful energy source of the known universe, in order to save his father. 
 
Live the Story in a immersive and cinematic VR experience.

esrb.synopsis: This is a VR adventure game in which players remember and re-live memories while roaming around a science base on Antarctica. Players can interact with objects, move levers and switches, and play through five different memory fragments. One memory fragment depicts a woman in lingerie talking to a character in bed; another scene shows the woman in a bathtub, with bubbles partially covering her breasts. During a dinner sequence, players' character can drink glasses of wine; alcohol is also referenced in the dialogue (e.g., “Your blood alcohol level is higher than normal” and “Beer, the best drink ever.”). The word “sh*t” appears in the game.
